synopsis.text: Sakura Nagashi, the captivating theme song for the anime film Evangelion: 3.33 You Can (Not) Redo, is brought to life in a mesmerizing music video by renowned singer Hikaru Utada. The music video, available on Utada's YouTube channel for a limited 24-hour period, is a visual feast that combines scenes from the original film with never-before-seen footage. This unique blend creates an immersive experience that not only complements the film's narrative but also stands as a standalone visual masterpiece, offering fans a fresh perspective on the beloved anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
